argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istrg.1 | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elin | |- ( R e. ( TopGrp i^i Ring ) <-> ( R e. TopGrp /\ R e. Ring ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( R e. ( TopGrp i^i Ring ) /\ M e. TopMnd ) <-> ( ( R e. TopGrp /\ R e. Ring ) /\ M e. TopMnd ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = M ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( mulGrp ` r ) e. TopMnd <-> M e. TopMnd ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-trg | |- TopRing = { r e. ( TopGrp i^i Ring ) | ( mulGrp ` r ) e. TopMnd } |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. TopRing <-> ( R e. ( TopGrp i^i Ring ) /\ M e. TopMnd ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( R e. TopGrp /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. TopMnd ) <-> ( ( R e. TopGrp /\ R e. Ring ) /\ M e. TopMnd ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 8, 9 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( R e. TopRing <-> ( R e. TopGrp /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. TopMnd ) ) |
